title: Premiere: Mute – Fire//Exotic Lovers
content:
It’s only been a couple of weeks and 2 more cuts from the still allusive Mute drop into my inbox.

The game has changed, Fire and Exotic Lovers are longer, dustier and more danceable and yet also manage to holds the mystery that first cut Here I Am held so tightly to its chest. Although there’s certainly a missing element from the tracks, most probably an MC, the sonic comparisons to Mos Def and early Gonjasufi productions make it hard not to be more than a little intrigued as to where Mute will take us in the future.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
